// featured projects

railsconf 2018

built the website for railsconf 2018.

features: incorporate design elements from the conference's host city (pittsburgh), dynamically display pages based on json imported from an admin tool

ruby on rails
javascript
svg animation
html
sass

girl develop it - teaching assistant management system

re-built girl develop it (gdi) chicago's teaching assistant management system (tams), which allows teaching assistants to connect with local gdi chapters for volunteering opportunities.

features: a teaching assistant application process, maintaining a database of teaching assistants, scheduling classes, automated communication with teaching assistants about upcoming volunteer opportunities, tracking teaching assistant history

javascript
ruby on rails
html
material design
heroku
